data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Sheikhpura, Bihar, India. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Sheikhpura, Bihar, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Sheikhpura do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: the county of Sheikhpura has (about) 6,999 people who know Jesus, 7,720 people who know about him culturally, and 621,580 people who are far from Jesus.
Lord, to the people of Sheikhpura you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Beg people might believe through him.
Father, make bold the prophets in Sheikhpura, Bihar, India so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Sheikhpura, Bihar, India. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.section_summary:
the county of Sheikhpura, Bihar, India has a population of 636,300.

We estimate Sheikhpura has 6,999 people who might know Jesus, 7,720 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 621,580 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 6,999 believers in Sheikhpura that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.
